name: CMSampleTimingInfo
desc: A collection of timing information for a sample in a sample buffer.

items.name: init(duration: CMTime, presentationTimeStamp: CMTime, decodeTimeStamp: CMTime)
var decodeTimeStamp: CMTime
items.desc: The time at which the sample will be decoded.

items.name: var presentationTimeStamp: CMTime
items.desc: The time at which the sample will be presented.
